name: Stratus Queen Upholstered Bed, Brown Faux Leather

reviews.name: Stratus Queen Upholstered Bed, Brown Faux Leather
reviews.reviewText: Easy to follow instructions, sturdy, great bed for the price:) Looks amazing!
reviews.title: Great Bed!!!

reviews.name: Stratus Queen Upholstered Bed, Brown Faux Leather
reviews.reviewText:
This queen bed was missing slats and attachments for slats. Without the slats, the bed is not useable as is. I've contacted the company 5 times via phone and email (as per the company's request) for the missing items to be sent to me. NO RESPONSE has been provided to my requests for parts; in fact, I have no contact from a rep addressing my concerns at all.

You are better off buying a different bed where you can obtain all the parts! I had to spend extra to get slats to fill in the missing sections, as well as extra padding to cushion my bed so I don't feel the metal beam in the center of the bed.

I do not recommend this bed. I will not buy from this company again.
reviews.title: Missing Parts...Company refuses to respond

reviews.name: Stratus Queen Upholstered Bed, Brown Faux Leather
reviews.reviewText: we just ordered this bed and it did not come with the "bilateral glue box" which is needed to join all the slats. which is just AWESOME because who needs the slats anyways, its not like they hold up the bed or anything! thank god for duct tape! i highly recommend this bed to..... no one!
reviews.title: great bed if you like sleeping on the floor

reviews.name: Stratus Queen Upholstered Bed, Brown Faux Leather
reviews.reviewText: So happy with this purchase. The instructions were easy for my dad to follow and the assembly only took 30 mins. The faux leather looks stylish and clean. Plus the bed is pretty sturdy. Definitely worth the money ;)
reviews.title: Awesome bed!

reviews.name: Stratus Queen Upholstered Bed, Brown Faux Leather
reviews.reviewText: I have had this bed frame for about two months or so now and it has been amazing. it is very beautiful and very sturdy. i took a chance buying from this brand i had never heard of but i am really glad i did.
reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
